segments.text: So , how are you feeling today ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I ’ m pretty tired . I haven ’ t been sleeping well .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you have enough time to get the right amount of sleep ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I have enough time . I just can ’ t seem to fall asleep and stay asleep .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What time do you usually go to bed ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I don ’ t have one time in particular . I just go to sleep whenever I feel tired .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Have you been under a lot of stress lately ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I just lost my job , and I am unsure about being able to find another one .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Have you ever tried doing relaxation exercises before you go to bed ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I haven ’ t ever tried that , but it sounds like a good idea .
segments.speaker: S2
